description:
Book Description
Publication Date: August 19, 2014
Warning: This book is meant for mature audiences only. It depicts graphic sex between humans, aliens, and a robot.

38 year old Commander Lita McHenry and 32 year old Lt. Commander Nikki Wilson are on a mission aboard the DSS Freeman, a deep-space cargo transport, to resupply Deep Earth Colony 6. Lita finds herself attracted to her shy crewmate but wonders if Nikki feels the same. She tries to contain herself but the close quarters on their ship make it seemingly impossible. Temptation flares and drives Lita to give into her desires but a horrific catastrophe puts her plans on hold... or does it?

A freak accident forces Lita and Nikki to abandon their ship and seek refuge on a nearby, life-sustaining, alien planet. After enduring a crash landing, the women finally find a moment of lust together in the lifeboat that has become their home. Determined to secure their survival until they can figure out how to call for help, Lita and Nikki set out to explore the planet for sustenance.

Things go from bad to worse when these two space-travelling vixens come face to face with a race of tentacled, tribal aliens and are taken prisoner.

Follow Lita and Nikki in Book 1 of the Lust in Space series called Stranded and experience the lust and fear and sex through the eyes of the Commander of the DSS Freeman.

Biography
Hi peeps!

My name is Erika Rios. Well, not really. Erika Rios is my pen name, my naughty persona that allows me to explore all the hot, sexy corners of my delicious sexuality. It allows me to lather you with my naughty tales while teasing you from behind a mask of mystery. That is exactly who I am: a naughty teasing mystery.

I love sex and to be pleasured. Unfortunately with my real lifestyle, I don't get to explore many things. Good thing Erika isn't like that. Erika loves to fantasize about all sorts of sexy things to get the blood pumping and the juices flowing.

One of my friends had told me that I should write about my fantasies and that is exactly what I'm doing. You'll be treated to everything from bondage to groups with some alien sex thrown around too (tentacles... mmm!). What woman doesn't like the idea of having something filling all of her holes at the same time until she bursts.

So I hope you enjoy my naughty side.

Upcoming Series:

Lust in Space: Follow the hot, sexy adventures of two space-travelling vixens as they explore their own sexuality together and coping with being stranded on an alien planet. They are captured by a tribe of tentacled aliens and nearly turned into sex slaves. How juicy is that? (Book 1 is out now!)

Soccer Mom Slut: Amy is your ordinary housewife and mother, or so it seems. She has four children that keep her rather busy with sports and activities and has to contend with coaches and parents that seem to disagree with her at every corner. So she employs some rather unique and sexy tactics to get what she wants... and she ALWAYS gets what she wants.
